lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers star forward Blake Griffin will undergo minor surgery on his right knee this week and is expected to be sidelined until at least January, the NBA club said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Clippers' Griffin to Be Sidelined 3-6 Weeks
headline.main: Clippers' Griffin to Be Sidelined 3-6 Weeks

snippet: Los Angeles Clippers star forward Blake Griffin will undergo minor surgery on his right knee this week and is expected to be sidelined until at least January, the NBA club said on Monday....
